attributes.action: have "Right Honourable" removed from MPs titles until such time that the electorate can have transparency and regain trust from their representative in Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Brown, we petition you to speak with Her Majesty The Queen to have "Right Honourable" removed from MPs titles until such time that the electorate can have transparency and regain trust from their representative in Parliament.

After revelations of aides plotting false accusations to discredit opponents, shameless 'milking' of the expenses system (one that has no acceptable form of governance surrounding it)and heinous treatment of British Soldiers (the most recent case being the Gurkhas) there can be no trust between the House of Commons and the Electorate.

The only democratic way to begin resolving the issue is to have MPs shamed by our leige and commence a General Election without delay.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
